modName: The Lost Legend of Captain Sharphook - Nexus Exclusive
summary: Long ago, the infamous pirate Captain Sharphook vanished with a stolen treasure. Can you, Dragonborn, follow the clues and solve the forgotten mystery of Sharphook and his lost treasure?
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ahlLOpP.png[/img]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Yay! We\'ve made it to 100 endorsements! (About damn time! ;D) Thanks to all who have taken the time to show their appreciation and support. We look forward to giving even more great content in the near future. ;)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=red]Version 2.0 is now available for download! It is cleaner than the original and it was made from scratch. No conflicts! (Or there shouldn\'t be anyway.)[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://i.imgur.com/7MpIffy.png[/img]
Long ago, the infamous pirate Ulfgar Sharphook disappeared with a massive treasure stolen from Atmora. Can you, the Dragonborn of legend, decipher the clues left in his wake and at last find the long lost treasure of Captain Sharphook?

An unmarked quest filled with mystery, adventure, a shiny new dungeon and piratey charm. Adventure around Skyrim to solve the mystery of the lost Captain Sharphook by deciphering clues and riddles through detective work and clever problem solving. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://i.imgur.com/E12cKYJ.png[/img]
Captain Hargar at Broken Oar Grotto has received a rather interesting letter... It can be found on his desk in Broken Oar Grotto.

[color=red]WARNING: May be a bit challenging. There is a hints.txt file for those who may find it too challenging. Only use this if you absolutely need to![/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remember: if you like it, endorse it!

[b]Check out the new and improved trailer under the video tab! 
Or you can go here and watch!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4XXpTzB8orU&feature=youtu.be[/b]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[img]http://i.imgur.com/D99hWRN.png[/img]
1.0 - Release
1.1 - A bug fix or two and got rid of some excess  meshes
1.2 - Fixed an issue with logs not showing the whole text
     - Changed the plank to look better for the setting
1.25 - Cleaned up some unneeded references to help with stability. Should be more stable now.
1.31 - Fixed issues that were created by the 1.25 version. Should also be more stable now too.
1.3.2 - Removed an extra note that was used for testing and fixed minor spelling errors.
1.3.3 - Fixed issues with iron arrows not showing up properly.
1.3.4 - General fixes and re-organized files.
1.3.5 - Fixed Spelling errors.
        - Re-balanced some enemies
        - Minor clean up of references
        - Removed unused notes
        - Removed unwanted guests from The Jagged Edge 
2.0 - A complete overhaul with a brand new esp file.
author: DarthWulff and KirionaWulff

files.changelogHtml:
Completely new esp file from scratch
Overhauled The Plank Tavern and made it original
Overhauled The Jagged Edge to make it original
Revamped the final dungeon and made improvements
Improved enemies and trapes
